name: SWS WordPress Tweaks
upgrade_notice: Keeping up with the lastest version means fewer errors.
author: Sharon Stromberg

sections.description:
This plugin is a repository for tweaks that I want to make to most or all of my sites. At present, it includes the following features, which may be independently turned off or on...
  • Increase default max upload size
  • Fix bug in password reset message
  • Fix bug in iThemes Security font path
  • Disable new user notifications
  • Disable password change notifications
  • Disable xml-rpc
  • Add server tag to bottom of Home and About pages
  • Fail validation for specified Gravity Forms field containing HTML or non-English characters
  • Add function to log php to JS console
  • Add styles for collapsing divs, with a shortcode to apply it to specific elements by id.
  • Customize login page logo/URL
  • Ban user registrations from a variety of spammish domains/extensions
  • Delete users (below Author) who have not logged in within 60 days of registration
  • Utility for displaying most popular posts
  • Implement Maintenance Mode from plugin dashboard
